wikitext.*:
'''Girithron''' is the [[Sindarin]] name for the twelfth month of the year, following [[Hithui]], according to the calendars of the [[Dunedain]]. ''Girithron'' in the [[Kings' Reckoning|Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] corresponded to [[Foreyule]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[21 November]] through [[20 December]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name apparently contains ''[[girith]]'' "shivering" and ''raun'' "[[moon]], month".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[David Salo]]|articleurl=https://tolkienlistsearch.herokuapp.com/message/5e9c3600df6700ce9c85c029|website=[[Elfling]]|articlename=queren, ringare}}</ref>
